Your path to prosperity starts here. jrussom view on Trust Pilot Transformative Bitcoin Mining Experience I only signed up with mining automatic a few weeks ago, and it's already been a great experience. I was previously engaged with the folks at RankOne on another passive business opportunity when the mining opportunity was presented. While I admittedly somewhat struggle to understand the full concept cryptocurrency, I've always been intrigued and wanted to get involved in crypto investing. Since I was already engaged with this company on a separate venture, I already trusted them and knew that they provide exceptional customer service that is second to none. I can say this with absolute confidence, because before finding them I had already engaged with two other companies on different passive investment opportunities and there is truly no comparison. Both of the other companies have stipulations around communication with the team - I.e. can only schedule a call with them once a month, can only be a 15min call, needs to be scheduled in advance, takes several days (sometimes weeks) to get a reply to an email etc. I almost didn't move forward with my first RankOne opportunity because of the subpar experience with the other companies. But there was something about the folks at RankOne that stood out from the others. I felt a different level of professionalism with them which instilled some trust and I took a lear of faith. And let me tell you, I am so glad I did. My only regret is that I didn't find them first. From the beginning, they thoroughly explained their process and set clear expectations. I have dedicated contacts and access to them any time I have questions or need them. They proactively reach out to me with any new updates, or sometimes even just to check in and make sure things are going well on my side. So, when the crypto mining opportunity presented itself, it was an easy decision!! It was the perfect chance to get involved in the crypto world with a company that I trusted! The onboarding was even easier and faster than expected. And, I'm only a few weeks in and already received my first payment!! If you're looking for a true passive income opportunity, but on the fence about this... take the leap of faith!! You will be glad you did! This is the company you want to do business with!!
